After trying quite a few Raspberry Pi operating systems and configurations, the new RasPlex is my choice for my home media centre. Removing cData from YQL queries

When pulling data from xml items using YQL and getJSON, your application will unfortunately not parse tags that have cdata. This post describe show to use the feed normalizer table to call all elements including those with cdata.
